subject: Economy
topic: Rashtriya Aay (National Income) aur Samriddhi ki Avdharna
question_en: What is the current GDP growth rate of India?
question_hi: भारत के नवीन आंतरिक वृद्धि की गतिविधि कार्यक्रम क्या है?
explanation_en: The current GDP growth rate of India is approximately 7.5%. As of Q3 2021, the GDP growth rate stands at 7.5%.
explanation_hi: भारत के नवीन आंतरिक वृद्धि कार्यक्रम
question_en: What is the role of GST in India's economy?
A_en: GST plays a crucial role in India's economy.
